newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Plane carrying six people crashes in Brazil.
newsitem.headline: Plane carrying six people crashes in Brazil.

text.p: A small plane carrying six people slammed into a mountain in southeastern Brazil on Thursday but there was no immediate word of survivors or casualties, authorities and news reports said.

News reports said a Cessna plane carrying five passengers and a pilot crashed in a mountainous area in Sao Paulo state. The reports said the plane took off from Franca in the state's western region and was heading for Sao Paulo.
An official at Brazil's national airport administration Infraero said a light aircraft had crashed but he could not give any more details.
